item.title: CI/CD 101 notes
item.description: CI/CD # Continuous Integration Continuous Delivery Continuous Deployment Continuous Integration # Check-in code Build Run autontion test Merge code to main branch erly and often. test faaster than 5 mins or t least shorter thn 15 mins
